crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonShortDescription: Prosecution witness absent: police
crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonFullDescription: Police witnesses failed to attend on the date set for trial. Please record the name of the officer(s) who failed to attend in the comments, as this will assist the police and CPS when they review the returns.

crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonShortDescription: Prosecution failed to disclose unused material
crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonFullDescription: This covers failing to comply with their statutory duties in a timely manner, including failing to review unused material or a defence statement, or making late disclosure of unused material that either undermined the prosecution case or assisted the defence case. Please record the name of the prosecutor in the comments box

crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonShortDescription: Prosecution end case: insufficient evidence
crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonFullDescription: On the date of the trial the prosecution offers no evidence because of insufficient evidence.

crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonShortDescription: Prosecution end case: adjournment refused
crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonFullDescription: Prosecution offers no evidence: adjournment refused

crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonShortDescription: Prosecution not ready: specify in comments
crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonFullDescription: On the date of trial the prosecution could not proceed, as their case was not trial-ready. The name of the prosecutor and the specific reason that the prosecution failed to be trial-ready should be entered in the comments and not relate to any other reason in M to P, for discussion at local management meetings.

crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonShortDescription: Prosecution end case: public interest grounds
crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonFullDescription: Prosecution offers no evidence: public interest grounds

crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonShortDescription: Defendant deceased
crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonFullDescription: The defendant has died.

crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonShortDescription: Prosecution not ready: served late notice of additional evidence on defence
crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonFullDescription: The trial could not go ahead because the prosecution did not provide timely service of additional evidence. Please record the name of the prosecutor in the comments box.

crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonShortDescription: Unable to proceed with trial because defendant incapable through alcohol/drugs
crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonFullDescription: On the date of trial the defendant is found to be in no fit state to proceed with the trial (and no further trial date is set)

crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonShortDescription: Acceptable guilty plea(s) to alternative new charge (not previously on the charge sheet), previously rejected by the prosecution
crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonFullDescription: On the date of trial the prosecution prefers an alternative charge which the defendant is willing to plead to.

crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonShortDescription: Prosecution end case: witness absent / withdrawn
crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonFullDescription: On the date of trial the prosecution offers no evidence because of witness unavailability.

crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonShortDescription: Acceptable guilty plea(s) entered late to some or all charges / counts on the charge sheet, previously rejected by the prosecution
crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonFullDescription: On the date of trial the prosecution accepts a conditional plea having previously rejected the offer from the defence.

crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonShortDescription: Acceptable guilty plea(s) entered late to some or all charges / counts on the charge sheet, offered for the first time by the defence
crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonFullDescription: On the date of trial the defendant, for the first time, enters a guilty plea which the prosecution accepts.

crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonShortDescription: Acceptable guilty plea(s) to alternative new charge (not previously on the charge sheet), first time offered by defence
crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonFullDescription: On the date of trial the defence agrees to offer a guilty plea to a new or amended charge, which the prosecution accepts.

crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonShortDescription: Defendant bound over, acceptable to prosecution, offered for the first time by the defence
crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonFullDescription: On the date of trial the defence offers/agrees to accept a bind-over, the prosecution concurs.

crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonShortDescription: Defendant bound over, now acceptable to prosecution - previously rejected by the prosecution
crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonFullDescription: On the date of trial the prosecution agrees to the defendant being bound-over having previously rejected the offer.

crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonShortDescription: Defence increased time estimate –insufficient time for trial to start
crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonFullDescription: The trial cannot start because the defence has increased the time needed in the estimate. In the comments box please state why the trial could not start.

crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonShortDescription: Prosecution advocate failed to attend
crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonFullDescription: Advocate fails to attend. Please record the name of the prosecutor and the reason for absence in the comment box.

crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonShortDescription: Outstanding cases in the magistrates' court
crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonFullDescription: Outstanding cases / sent in a magistrates' court

crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonShortDescription: Lack of court time: Prosecution request increased time estimate
Defence asked for additional prosecution witness to attend
crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonFullDescription: Defence make a late request for the attendance of a prosecution witness not previously warned.

crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonShortDescription: Case not reached / insufficient cases drop out / Floater not reached
crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonFullDescription: The case could not be heard for trial because it was a floating / backer / reserve case and was not reached because other cases did not drop out of the list.

crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonShortDescription: Prosecution increased time estimate - insufficient time for trial to start
crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonFullDescription: The trial cannot start because the prosecution has increased the time needed in the estimate. In the comments box please state why the trial could not start.

crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonShortDescription: Defendant not produced by PECS
crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonFullDescription: The defendant who was in custody, was not produced in time for the trial to go ahead – Please use the comments box if the defendant was delivered late or to another court on a different charge.

crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonShortDescription: Defendant absent – unable to proceed as Defendant not notified of place and time of hearing
crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonFullDescription: Please give a clear description of how this situation arose in the comment box

crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonShortDescription: Defence advocate engaged in other trial
crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonFullDescription: Advocate unexpectedly over-running in another courtroom

crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonShortDescription: Defence not ready: specify in comments (inc. no instructions)
crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonFullDescription: The defence was not ready to proceed on the date of trial - here the reason should be entered in the comments box for discussion at local management meetings.

crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonShortDescription: Prosecution witness not able to attend trial: Other witness.
Prosecution end case – Prosecution discontinue case prior to trial date
Defendant changed plea to guilty: alternative charge
Defence not ready: further preparation needed. Defence legal rep not available.
Prosecution witness absent: other
crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonFullDescription: One or more civilian witnesses failed to attend on the date set for trial. If the reason for non-attendance is known, please record this in the comments box for discussion at local management meetings.

crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonShortDescription: Defence witness absent
crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonFullDescription: One or more defence witnesses failed to attend on the date set for trial. Please use the comments box to explain the reason the court gave as to why it did not proceed.

crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonShortDescription: Another case over-ran
crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonFullDescription: If the trial could not go ahead because an earlier trial over-ran, then please note this in the comments box for discussion at local management meetings.

crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonShortDescription: Defendant absent - did not proceed in absence (judicial discretion)
crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonFullDescription: Please set out reason court gave for not proceeding in absence.

crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonShortDescription: Equipment / accommodation failure/adverse weather
crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonFullDescription: Equipment / accommodation failure/adverse weather

crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonShortDescription: Lack of court time: Court vacate trial due to anticipated lack of court time
Prosecution not ready: prosecution not ready for trial, further preparation needed.
Defendant bound over at PCMH
Right to representation problems: Defendant dismissed legal representative.
No interpreter available
crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonFullDescription: To include incorrect language or dialect interpreter, or the interpreter is not on the approved list as per the national guidelines. Please note this in the Comments box for discussion at local management meetings

crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonShortDescription: Judge / magistrate availability due to illness etc
crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonFullDescription: There was a lack of magistrate / Judge availability due to magistrates / Judge being disqualified from sitting on the case in question, illness or otherwise absent from court because of illness or other cause.

crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonShortDescription: Defence witness not able to attend trial
Prosecution offers no evidence not ready: served late notice of additional evidence on defence
crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonFullDescription: The trial could not go ahead because the prosecution did not provide timely service of additional evidence. Please record the name of the prosecutor in the comments box.

crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonShortDescription: Defence not ready: disclosure problems
crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonFullDescription: The trial could not go ahead because of the late service of the defence statement, service of an inadequate defence statement or late notification of details of an alibi witness, which did not provide the prosecution sufficient time to investigate and the making of a late Section 8 application.

crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonShortDescription: Defendant ill or otherwise unfit to proceed
crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonFullDescription: It is important to find out when the illness started and note the date in the comments box.

crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonShortDescription: Prosecution advocate engaged in another trial
crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonFullDescription: Advocate unexpectedly over-running in another courtroom. Please record the name of the prosecutor in the comments box.

crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonShortDescription: Defendant ill / deceased / unable to attend.
Accommodation / equipment failure/ Adverse weather
Defence advocate failed to attend
crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonFullDescription: Advocate fails to attend

crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonShortDescription: Transfers out and errors (see page 3 of this guidance)
Insufficient jurors available
crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonFullDescription: Insufficient jurors available

crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonShortDescription: Guilty plea with exceptional hardship pleaded.
Prosecution witness absent: prosecution witness not able to attend trial: police witness.
Defendant dismissed advocate
crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonFullDescription: Defendant dismissed advocate

crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonShortDescription: Guilty plea at PCMH, trial fixed at PLY
Prosecution witness absent: professional / expert
crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonFullDescription: Key professional / expert witness(es) failed to attend on the date set for trial. Please record the name of the witness in the comments box.

crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonShortDescription: Outstanding cases in other Crown Court centre
crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonFullDescription: Outstanding cases / sent in other Crown Court centre

crackedIneffectiveVacatedTrialTypes.reasonShortDescription: Prosecution witness absent: prosecution witness not able to attend trial: Police witness. Counsel not available, Counsel ill.
Lack of court time: Defence request increased time estimate
Defendant changed plea to guilty: original charge
